thread.title: Weather forces football postponements - High School Sports
thread.title_full: Weather forces football postponements - High School Sports - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Weather forces football postponements - High School Sports
text:
RIDGEFIELD PARK - Ridgefield Park's Big North American Division home football game Friday night against Pascack Hills was postponed and rescheduled for Saturday at 7 p.m.
Buy this photo RECORD FILE PHOTO Scarlets coach Pete Kraljic said the "officials determined the [grass] field was unsafe" after thunderstorms hit the area.
The St. Mary at Weehawken football game also was postponed due to the weather. It will be played Saturday at noon. 
--Staff report
